ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Message boards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, I would like to share something I am wearng now, those others might not agree, but I love it: Shoulders: Meditative Blanket - AC 10 (Magic) (No Drop)
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, I would like to share something I am wearng now, those others might
not agree, but I love it:

Shoulders:
Meditative Blanket - AC 10
(Magic) (No Drop) (Lore)
(STR +2) (AGI +2) (INT +3) (WIS +3)

Back:
Kunzar Cloak - AC 7
(Magic) (Lore)
(INT +2( (WIS +2) (FR +10)

well, I am a lvl 55 high elf enchie, with my own buff, I can reach 198
INT/206 CHA, so I would give up some INT boost items and take up AC items
instead.

just my 2 cents......

Tiffa Dancinsword
Lvl 55 High-Elf Enchanteress from Erollisi Marr
Proud member of Divine Grace

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bradley Stanfield" <ZeoMax@...>
To: <eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:28 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Message boards?


> shoulders = (sebilis) worn cloth mantle its like 5 cha
>
> back = (quest) mystic cloak its like 5 int

> yupyup

> Aerion Velwin
